Introduction

This is my personal report of what I did at the ISITDTU CTF, spoiler alert: not so much :(

item.title: First post
item.description:
Introduction

Welcome to my first attempt at writing a page with hugo!
I found a nice tutorial and I also wanted a personal web space so… here we are.

What will I post here?

Most likely CTFs writeups or portfolio. But, anything goes!
